behavior.name: three_dimesional_coverage_path_planning_execute_path
behavior.author: Katrin Becker
behavior.description: This behavior handles the execution of a precomputed path.

param.name: use_recovery
param.label: use_recovery
param.hint: Whether to use recovery or not.

param.name: speed
param.label: speed
param.hint: Sets the speed. If left at 0.0, controller default is used.
